snippet.title: Realm of Ink - Early Access Release Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Watch the official trailer of Realm of Ink' Early Access, where it showcases the newly designed levels of the first chapter as well as the amazing A'Kuan form with its unique staff weapon.

The Early Access release date is set for September 27th, 2024.

During the Early Access, you'll get to enjoy:

Complete 4-act levels and battle against 8 bosses, and finally face the ultimate boss - the Book's Spirit.
Play as the playable character, Red the Swordswoman, who has 9 distinct forms and weapons.
Experience the full gameplay of 22 Ink Gem skills across 4 tiers.
Engage with the full gameplay of 15 Ink Pets across 4 tiers and over 40 forms.
Over 130 Perks that offer diverse building possibilities.
Explore the first layer of world-building and about 50% of the storyline.

And great news! A new demo has just been updated on Steam. Go ahead and give it a try!
Download on Realm of Ink's Steam store page: store.steampowered.com/app/2597080/Realm_of_Ink/

We look forward to your joining this exciting journey and embarking in the Realm of Ink!


#realmofink  #indiegame  #roguelike

-------------------------------------------------------------

Check out and subscribe our social media channels for more exclusives contents and insight of the game:
X: X.com/realmofink
Facebook: www.facebook.com/RealmofInk
Discord: discord.gg/X63T277eVn
Official website: realmofink.com
